movabsq.name: Move
movabsq.desc: Copy src to dest. src can be up to 8 bytes long, and dest must be a register.

movsb.name: Move Sign-Extended
movsb.desc: Copy src to dest, extending the sign of src.

movsw.name: Move Sign-Extended
movsw.desc: Copy src to dest, extending the sign of src.

movslq.name: Move Sign-Extended
movslq.desc: Copy src to dest, extending the sign of src.

movzb.name: Move Zero-Extended
movzb.desc: Copy src to dest, setting the high-order bytes of dest to zero.

movzw.name: Move Zero-Extended
movzw.desc: Copy src to dest, setting the high-order bytes of dest to zero.

cmove.name: Conditional Move (Equal)
cmove.desc: Copy long or word operand src to long or word register dest iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate an equal to.

cmovne.name: Conditional Move (Not Equal)
cmovne.desc: Copy long or word operand src to long or word register dest iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate not equal to.

cmovl.name: Conditional Move (Less than)
cmovl.desc: Copy long or word operand src to long or word register dest iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate less than (signed numbers).

cmovle.name: Conditional Move (Less than or Equal)
cmovle.desc: Copy long or word operand src to long or word register dest iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate less than (signed numbers) or equal to.

cmovg.name: Conditional Move (Greater than)
cmovg.desc: Copy long or word operand src to long or word register dest iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate greater than (signed numbers).

cmovge.name: Conditional Move (Greater than or Equal)
cmovge.desc: Copy long or word operand src to long or word register dest iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate greater than or equal to (signed numbers).

cmovb.name: Conditional Move (Below)
cmovb.desc: Copy long or word operand src to long or word register dest iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate below (unsigned numbers).

cmovbe.name: Conditional Move (Below or Equal)
cmovbe.desc: Copy long or word operand src to long or word register dest iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate below (unsigned numbers) or equal.

cmova.name: Conditional Move (Above)
cmova.desc: Copy long or word operand src to long or word register dest iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate above (unsigned numbers).

cmovae.name: Conditional Move (Above or Equal)
cmovae.desc: Copy long or word operand src to long or word register dest iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate above (unsigned numbers) or equal.

pushq.name: Push
pushq.desc:
Push quad src onto the stack. Equivalent to
subq $8, %rsp
movq src (%rsp)

pushw.name: Push
pushw.desc:
Push word src onto the stack. Equivalent to
subq $2, %rsp
movw src (%rsp)

popq.name: Push
popq.desc:
Pop quad from the stack into dest. Equivalent to
movq (%rsp), dest
addq $8, %rsp

popw.name: Push
popw.desc:
Pop word from the stack into dest. Equivalent to
movw (%rsp), dest
addq $2, %rsp

lea.name: Load Effective Address
lea.desc: Assign the address of src to dest. That is, determine the address denoted by src, but don't fetch data from that address; instead use the address itself.

cqto.name: Convert Quad to Oct Register
cqto.desc: Sign extend the contents of register RAX into the register pair RDX:RAX, typically in preparation for idivq.

cltd.name: Convert Long to Double Register
cltd.desc: Sign extend the contents of register EAX into the register pair EDX:EAX, typically in preparation for idivl.

cwtd.name: Convert Word to Double Register
cwtd.desc: Sign extend the contents of register AX into the register pair DX:AX, typically in preparation for idivw.

cbtw.name: Convert Byte to Word
cbtw.desc: Sign extend the contents of register AL into register AX, typically in preparation for idivb.

add.name: Add
add.flags: O, S, Z, A, C, P

adc.name: Add with carry
adc.desc: Add src and the C flag to dest.
adc.flags: O, S, Z, A, C, P

sub.name: Subtract
sub.flags: O, S, Z, A, C, P

neg.name: Negate
neg.flags: O, S, Z, A, C, P

imul.name: Multiply
imul.flags: O, S, Z, A, C, P

and.name: And
and.flags: O, S, Z, A, C, P

or.name: Or
or.flags: O, S, Z, A, C, P

xor.name: Exclusive Or
xor.desc: Bitwise exclusive or src into dest.
xor.flags: O, S, Z, A, C, P

sal.name: Shift Arithmetic Left
sal.desc: Shift dest to the left by src bits, filling with zeros.  If src is a register, then it must be the CL register.
sal.flags: O, S, Z, A, C, P

sar.name: Shift Arithmetic Right
sar.desc: Shift dest to the right by src bits, sign extending the number.  If src is a register, then it must be the CL register.
sar.flags: O, S, Z, A, C, P

shl.name: Shift Left
shl.desc: Shift dest to the left by src bits, filling with zeros.  If src is a register, then it must be the CL register.  (Same as sal)
shl.flags: O, S, Z, A, C, P

shr.name: Shift Right
shr.desc: Shift dest to the right by src bits, filling with zeros.  If src is a register, then it must be the CL register.
shr.flags: O, S, Z, A, C, P

cmp.name: Compare
cmp.desc: Compute dest - src and set flags in the EFLAGS register based upon the result.
cmp.flags: O, S, Z, A, C, P

test.name: Shift Arithmetic Right
test.desc: Compute dest & src and set flags in the EFLAGS register based upon the result.

ret.name: Return
ret.desc: Return from current function.  That is, pop from the stack to the instruction pointer, to return to the address from which the function was called.

call.name: Call
call.desc: Push the address of the next instruction onto the stack and jump to location specified by label.

jmp.name: Jump
jmp.desc: Jump to the address specified by label, (overwrite the instruction pointer with the address of label).

je.name: Conditional Jump (Equal)
je.desc: Jump to address specified by label iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate an equal to.

jne.name: Conditional Jump (Not Equal)
jne.desc: Jump to address specified by label iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate not equal to.

jl.name: Conditional Jump (Less than)
jl.desc: Jump to address specified by label iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate less than (signed numbers).

jle.name: Conditional Jump (Less than or Equal)
jle.desc: Jump to address specified by label iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate less than (signed numbers) or equal to.

jg.name: Conditional Jump (Greater than)
jg.desc: Jump to address specified by label iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate greater than (signed numbers).

jge.name: Conditional Jump (Greater than or Equal)
jge.desc: Jump to address specified by label iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate greater than or equal to (signed numbers).

jb.name: Conditional Jump (Below)
jb.desc: Jump to address specified by label iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate below (unsigned numbers).

jbe.name: Conditional Jump (Below or Equal)
jbe.desc: Jump to address specified by label iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate below (unsigned numbers) or equal.

ja.name: Conditional Jump (Above)
ja.desc: Jump to address specified by label iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate above (unsigned numbers).

jae.name: Conditional Jump (Above or Equal)
jae.desc: Jump to address specified by label iff the flags in the EFLAGS register indicate above (unsigned numbers) or equal.

nop.name: No Operation
nop.desc: Do nothing for some specified number of clock cycles.

leave.name: Leave
leave.desc: Copy %rbp to %rsp and pop from the stack to %rbp, restoring the stack frame of the caller before returning.  This is the opposite of enter.
